title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 77 - Standards For Physical Facilities Of Hospitals For The Mentally Ill, Schools For The Retarded, And Alcohol Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 77 - Standards For Physical Facilities Of Hospitals For The Mentally Ill, Schools For The Retarded, And Alcohol Facilities

State Regulations
§ 77.1 - Introduction
§ 77.2 - The site and space utilization plan
§ 77.3 - Codes and regulations

§ 77.5 - Maintenance and operation of the physical plant
§ 77.6 - [Repealed]
§ 77.7 - Design and space requirements-all facilities
§ 77.8 - Design and space requirements-hospitals for the mentally ill
§ 77.9 - Design and space requirements-residential schools for the retarded
§ 77.10 - Design and space requirements-alcoholism facilities
§ 77.11 - Non-conforming facilities

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 77

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§7.09[b], 13.03, 31.04[a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
